name: loops
tagline: A self-hosted platform for managing customer messaging workflows
description: Loops is a self-hosted, open-source alternative to customer messaging platforms. It supports email campaigns, workflows, and customer segmentation for full control over user communications.

features.title: Email Campaigns
features.description: Create and send campaigns, Template management, Scheduling. Professional email marketing platform

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Trigger-based emails, Drip campaigns, Event-driven messaging. Automate customer communications

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Open rates, Click tracking, Campaign performance. Measure email effectiveness

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import contacts, List management, Subscriber profiles. Organize your audience efficiently

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Drag-and-drop builder, HTML support, Responsive design. Create beautiful emails easily

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API, Webhook support, Third-party connectors. Connect to your existing tools

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full data ownership, Privacy control, No vendor lock-in. Own your customer messaging platform
